QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_PipeSegmentBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all types and occurrences of pipe segments.

QtoDef.Name: Length
QtoDef.Definition: Length of the segment, calculated at midpoint of cross-section, equal to the distance between inlet and outlet ports.

QtoDef.Name: GrossCrossSectionArea
QtoDef.Definition: Area of the cross section, including the pipe itself and the interior flow space.

QtoDef.Name: NetCrossSectionArea
QtoDef.Definition: Area of the cross section of the pipe, excluding the interior flow space.

QtoDef.Name: OuterSurfaceArea
QtoDef.Definition: Total area of the extruded surfaces of the pipe (not taking into account the end cap areas), normally generated as perimeter * length.

QtoDef.Name: GrossWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Weight of the pipe segment itself, not including contained fluid.

QtoDef.Name: NetWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Weight of the pipe segment, including contained fluid as designed.
